column2: a total of 5 people did Omakase where we didn't have a set number of courses
column3: it was more of a "hey we'll bring us dishes until we say stop" style. Plus if you think about it
column4: it's SO MUCH CHEAPER than the ones listed on the menu. We ended up having 21 dishes for all 5 of us. I repeat TWENTY ONE DISHES. On top of that
column5: we had a bottle of wine and cold sake.
